mapper.select: SELECT u.id userId, u.nick_name nickname, u.role_id roleId, r.role_name roleName, u.conf_status confStatus, p.menu_code menuCode, p.permission_code permissionCode FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = u.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id AND rp.is_delete='0' WHERE u.user_name = #{username} AND u.is_delete='0'
SELECT p.permission_code permissionCode FROM sys_permission p where p.is_delete='0' ORDER BY p.id
SELECT p.menu_code menuCode FROM sys_permission p where p.is_delete='0' ORDER BY p.id
